bug.author: tgy
bug.summary: `dynamic_rnn`'s docstring refers to a non-existing `rnn` function
bug.description:
Here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L392>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py#L392</denchmark-link>
The docstring of the dynamic_rnn function refers to a non-existing rnn function. I don't know if it got deleted or moved somewhere else.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fchollet>@fchollet</denchmark-link> could you look into updating the documentation? Feel free to redirect as necessary.
good catch: waiting for the change to propagate through
